CarePlanTemplateBenefit.name: CarePlanTemplateBenefit
CarePlanTemplateBenefit.description: Represents a junction between a care plan template and a benefit. This object stores the benefit details of a care plan.

BenefitId.description: The name of the care plan template benefit record.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan template benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan template benefit record.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the care plan template benefit.
